|stockos = Linux;3.3.8;; |exp_if_types = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = TP-LINK_XXXX,TP-LINK_XXXX_5G |defaultssid_regex = ^TP-LINK_[A-F0-9]{4}(_5G)?$ |default_ch = |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = OpenWrt, |availability = EU/RU |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 12/09/2016 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B01LX8Z8TP |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9886; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "2050500733" and "1619" is silkscreened on the board in the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=3222554 FCC photos]. *[https://openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tp-link_archer_c60_v2 ''TP-LINK Archer C60 v2.0'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] ([https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/tp-link/tp-link_archer_c60_v2 HW Data]) :''Archer'' C60(RU) Ver:2.0 ([https://cs5-2.4pda.to/13202583/DSC01778.jpg label]) - id:52550000 ([https://4pda.ru/forum/index.php?showtopic=850946&st=60#entry75515265 4pda]) :CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9561/QCA9886 ([https://github.com/lede-project/source/pull/1563 GitHub])

{{see also|TP-LINK Archer C60 v1.x|TP-LINK Archer C59 v2.x}} *[https://www.redeszone.net/tp-link/archer-c60-ac1350/ ''TP-LINK Archer C60(EU) v1.0'' on '''RedesZone'''] ([https://www.redeszone.net/app/uploads/2017/01/tp-link_archer_c60_analisis_21.jpg PCB images]) :This device would seem to be using ''Archer'' C60(EU) Ver:1.0 ([https://ru.gecid.com/data/netlan/201702030804-47099/img/09_tp-link_archer_c60.jpg label]): :[[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9561-AL3A - WiSoC 3x3 802.11bgn (2.4GHz) :[[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9886 - 2x2 802.11an/ac (5GHz radio) ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/tp-link/tp-link_archer_c60_v2 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/archer_c60_v2 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = 18.06.0 |current_supported_version = 23.05.0 |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==Pictures==
